/archivo/markdown_extracciones/main/granitevision.md: NOTE: granite vision support was added to transformers very recently (4.49);
/archivo/markdown_extracciones/main/granitevision.md: if you get size mismatches, your version is too old.
/archivo/markdown_extracciones/main/granitevision.md: If you are running with an older version, set `ignore_mismatched_sizes=True`
/archivo/markdown_extracciones/main/granitevision.md: as shown below; it won't be loaded correctly, but the LLM part of the model that
/archivo/markdown_extracciones/main/granitevision.md: we are exporting will be loaded correctly.

/archivo/markdown_extracciones/main/build.md: Compilation
/archivo/markdown_extracciones/main/build.md: Override Compute Capability Specifications
/archivo/markdown_extracciones/main/build.md: 1. Take note of the `Compute Capability` of your NVIDIA devices: ["CUDA: Your GPU Compute > Capability"](https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda-gpus).
/archivo/markdown_extracciones/main/build.md: 2. Manually list each varying `Compute Capability` in the `CMAKE_CUDA_ARCHITECTURES` list.
/archivo/markdown_extracciones/main/build.md: Runtime CUDA environmental variables
/archivo/markdown_extracciones/main/build.md: Use `CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES` to hide the first compute device.

/archivo/markdown_extracciones/main/build.md: To verify the installation, use the command below:
